text: Hi all. I've submitted the practicum for the HubSpot CMS for Developers Certification. And Its been seven days since I submitted the practicum but still haven't received feedback or results. Can anyone help me to reach out to HubSpot Academy Team or guide me on what needs to be done?

Hi <@U05NK2J2ATU>, as per our <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#unwanted-solicitation-of-services|Code of Conduct>, self promotion is only allowed in <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> or <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase>. Please move this post to one of those channels.
